title: Guru Cafe and Cocktail Lounge
typeOfFood: Lacto, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Fusion, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Extended it menu in 2013 to include more vegetarian/vegan tapas, salads, and burgers. Offers juices and smoothies with add-in options. In the evenings, restaurant transforms into a lounge and cocktail bar and offers international beers, ecologic wines, original cocktails, and a list of gin and tonics. Live music.
